Html:
Hi All,

I am working now Silverlight Coverflow control. I have downloaded your application sample. It is very nice.

I want to implement the same with my own images. Please help me out, how to generate xml file for working coverflow control with my own images.

I have tried to implement coding, but i am getting error, "xml exception: data at the root level is invalid. line 1 position 1.".

Please help me, this is urgent task for me.

thanx,

Mallikarjuna.
